aboutSection.text:
Zod is the top choice for over 200+ growing UK brands looking to boost their growth and profits. We get fashion and know what it takes to stay ahead of the trends. That's why we offer exclusive, custom-made designs at unbeatable prices straight from expert manufacturers.

'With over 50,000+ designs, we've got you covered across every category': Dresses, Modest Wear, Abayas, Coats, Denim Jeans, Leather Jackets, Bags, and more. Our partners in Dubai, South Asia, and China ensure you get the lowest MOQs and the best wholesale prices.

Join the Zod family and let us help you take your brand to the next level with unique, trendy, and affordable fashion solutions tailored just for you.
aboutSection.aboutSectionDescription: Zod is the top choice for over 200+ growing European & American brands looking to boost their growth and profits. We get fashion and know what it takes to stay ahead of the trends. That's why we offer the widest variety in materials, crafting and textures.</br></br> Join the Zod family and let us help you take your brand to the next level with unique, trendy, and affordable crafting solutions tailored just for you.
aboutSection.descriptionForModestWear:
Zod is the top choice for over 200+ growing European & American modest wear brands looking to boost their growth and profits. We get fashion and know what it takes to stay ahead of the trends.

Connect directly with manufacturers in UAE, Pakistan and Bangladesh to ensure that you get wholesale factory prices and low MOQ.

Join the Zod family and let us help you take your brand to the next level with unique, trendy, and affordable solutions tailored just for you.
aboutSection.descriptionForLeather:
Zod is the top choice for over 200+ growing European & American leather jacket brands looking to boost their growth and profits. We get fashion and know what it takes to stay ahead of the trends.

Connect directly with manufacturers in Pakistan to ensure that you get wholesale factory prices, low MOQ and the highest quality genuine leather products.

Join the Zod family and let us help you take your brand to the next level with unique, trendy, and affordable fashion solutions tailored just for you.

brandSection.text1: Using zod as my supplier has been a very good experience to date. Very easy to place my order and if there are any issues it is sorted out straight away. One of the best suppliers I've worked with so far. Would very much recommend.
brandSection.text2: Earlier I was forced to spend money on airline tickets, travel from london to different countries in Middle East and South Asia to purchase products for my store, Now Zod has helped me save that money, time, and effort. They provide quality, unique products, they take returns if there is any issue, they do free quality assessment and provide the widest variety.I recommend Zod 100%.
brandSection.text3: I always struggled to source products from Pakistan and India, what I ordered came late and it was never the quality which they show online. With Zod I order without any worry, products are great, what they show, I get that same product, pricing is the best I have seen in the market. I recommend Zod 100% to get unique products for your store at amazing price

privacyPolicy.description1:
Zod, the operator of this website, is committed to preserving the privacy of those who visit this website. We have created this Privacy Policy in order to demonstrate our firm commitment to helping you better understand what information we collect about you and what may happen to that information during your visit to the website.

This Privacy Policy applies solely to information collected while visiting our website. By using or accessing our website, you signify your assent to our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to this privacy policy, you may not access or otherwise use the website.
privacyPolicy.description2:
While using our website, you may be asked to provide certain personally identifiable information about yourself, such as your name, photo, email address, address, phone number(s), Instagram profile, Facebook profile, Twitter handle, YouTube, TikTok, LinkedIn, selected interests, or date of birth.

Please note that Personal Information may also include personally identifiable information you voluntarily provide when you take a survey or a poll or enter a campaign, sweepstakes, or other promotion.
privacyPolicy.description3:
We may share your Personal Information with our clients, affiliates, technical consultants, or third parties, under confidentiality agreements, who compile the Aggregate Information, make our website available, enhance its functionality or provide associated services, and process your orders and/or deliver content, samples, supplies, or services. We may use your aggregate information to operate and enhance our website and for market research purposes.

We may share your information with our clients, affiliates, charity partners, and other third parties for advertising, promotional, and other purposes. Individual answers from you to questions within Programs marked as 'Confidential' may be shared with our affiliates, clients, and business partners, but those answers will not be labelled with, or linked to, your Personal Information.

Your username, city, profile photo, publicly declared preferences, and some of your activities may be shared with other Zod users within the website, including, without limitation, publication in a live feed of ongoing activities and leaderboards. You may also see such information related to other Zod members when logged into the website. We will never rent or sell your Personal Information to any third party without your consent.
privacyPolicy.description4:
We use cookies to personalize your experience on our platform and to analyze our traffic. Cookies are small data files stored on your device. You can manage your cookie preferences by adjusting your browser settings. Disabling cookies may affect the functionality of our website. For more information on how to manage and disable cookies, please refer to your browser's help documentation.

The website uses cookies to keep track of your activity and enhance your experience on the platform. If you wish to delete these cookies, you can set your browser to disable cookies.
privacyPolicy.description5:
We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information. These measures include Secure Socket Layer (SSL) technology to encrypt sensitive information, encryption of data at rest and in transit, and access control procedures to restrict access to data. However, please be aware that no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

Zod will not be liable for disclosures of your personal information due to errors in transmission or unauthorized acts of third parties. We have undertaken all commercially responsible efforts to prevent unauthorized Internet access to visitor data retained in our servers; however, due to the inherent open nature of the Internet, Zod will encrypt your data but does not ensure or warrant the security of any information you transmit to any information provided online.

You do so at your own risk and must accept all risks associated with any data transmission, including the risk that your personal information may be intercepted in transit. You are solely responsible for maintaining the secrecy of your passwords and/or any account information. Please be careful and responsible whenever you are online.
privacyPolicy.description6: Established members will occasionally receive emails containing information regarding new updates, Invitations, Zod's offers, and directives from Zod if they have opted in. 'Opted in' means the member has approved certain emails from Zod to be sent to them. Established members may opt out of these emails by updating their notifications on their profile settings page.
privacyPolicy.description7: Under certain circumstances, Zod may need to contact specific or all members in order to make an important announcement about the Website service changes. Members are not able to unsubscribe or opt-in/opt out of these announcements because they may contain very important information regarding their accounts. Before these measures are taken, however, Zod will post information regarding changes directly on the website. Zod reserves the right to contact members to correct account errors or to supply important information Zod deems relevant.
privacyPolicy.description8: We support various secure payment methods, including bank transfers, credit/debit cards, and online payment platforms. All transactions are encrypted, with payments typically required within 30 days of invoicing. We do not store sensitive banking information. Refunds and chargebacks are managed according to our policies, with fees clearly outlined and automatically deducted. Compliance with local and international laws. In cases of disputes or suspected fraud, we reserve the right to suspend accounts and hold funds as necessary. For any payment-related inquiries, please contact our support team.
privacyPolicy.description9: You have the right to access, correct, or delete the personal information that we hold. You may request to see the data we have collected about you, correct inaccuracies, or request the deletion of your data. To exercise these rights, please contact us at connect@zod.media. We will respond to your request in accordance with applicable laws
privacyPolicy.description10: By using our website, you consent to our collection and use of your personal information as described in this Privacy Policy. We will ask for your explicit consent before collecting any sensitive information. You may withdraw your consent at any time by contacting us at connect@zod.media. Please note that withdrawing consent may affect your ability to use certain features of the website.
privacyPolicy.description11:
We will notify you of any changes to this Privacy Policy by posting the updated policy on our website and by sending you an email notification. We encourage you to review this policy periodically to stay informed about how we are protecting your information. Your continued use of our website following the posting of changes constitutes your acceptance of such changes.

We reserve the right to change, add, or remove portions from this Privacy Policy at any time. All information posted on the Site is subject to change without notice. In addition, this Privacy Policy includes but is not limited to receiving communications from us and/or sharing your Personal Information with us at any time.

thankYou.willTouch: We have gotten your details and will be in touch within 24-48 hours. Need us sooner? Reach out anytime.
